name: spaceBOUND
description: spaceBOUND is a brutally challenging puzzle-platformer, set in a zero-gravity environment. Stranded and bound by their oxygen tether, two astronauts must work together to make it out alive. Go in alone, or team up and face the unknown.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.5Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
